original_title: Desaster:  live Party San Open Air 2003
overview: Party.San Open Air is a metal festival held annually in Schlotheim Flugplatz- Obermehler, Germany (near Muhlhausen). Desaster are a black/thrash metal band formed in Koblenz, Germany in 1988. Their lyrical themes involve war, hate and Satanism.
title: Desaster:  live Party San Open Air 2003
